00037 class World;
00038 class GraspableBody;

00042 class GraspitDBModel : public db_planner::Model{
00043 private:
00045         bool mGeometryLoaded;
00047         GraspableBody* mGraspableBody;
00048 public:
00049         GraspitDBModel() : mGraspableBody(NULL), mGeometryLoaded(false){}
00050         ~GraspitDBModel();
00052         int load(World* w);
00054         bool geometryLoaded() const {return mGeometryLoaded;}
00056         GraspableBody* getGraspableBody() const { return mGraspableBody; }
00057 };

00060 class GraspitDBModelAllocator : public db_planner::ModelAllocator
00061 {
00062 public:
00063         GraspitDBModelAllocator(){}
00064         db_planner::Model* Get() const {
00065                 return new GraspitDBModel();
